title: SportScore
author: SportScore
content: Hello:)I'm looking for telegram bot developerThe bot need to display data from my website: sportscore.ioAnd show it on telegram, I will explain in detail what I'm looking for.Please pm your telegram ID thanks.

comments.author: daBNC
comments.body: Hi there.You've opted to not allow messages from newbies so I can't send a PM.I have the relevant experience to create this small bot for ya.Discord: bncTelegram: https://t.me/yoitsbnc

comments.author: DONZAKA
comments.body: Let's chat on telegram so I can show you samples of previous bots I have designed and then we can discuss the attributes of your own bot.https://t.me/BotsManager1

comments.author: xizhnyak
comments.body: Hi, We made numerous crypto bots.DM me https://t.me/xizhnyak

comments.author: Trasher Travis
comments.body: Hi, I can help you with that.I'm a Nodejs developer, who preferably works on building crypto-based bots like auto trade scripts, Trading bots, and Alerts based on Blockchain events.You can reach me via Telegram: Travis_BZThanks!
